title: Hardest Champion to kill?
body:
{{champion:86}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:50}}  {{champion:113}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:82}} 

These champions can all be extermely hard to shut down because they are all tanky, and have some form of sustain or escape. Who would you say takes the most effort to kill?
